textBeforeTable: Perla OP 0.95   9 Items Best Match Alphabetical A-Z Alphabetical Z-A Sort By   Download Datasheet Installation and Maintenance Guarantee Request Sample Request Literature Project Gallery Declaration of Performance TOOLBOX Armstrong Perla OP 0.95 ceiling features a plain, smooth and flat textured surface, provides an excellent level of sound absorption (0.95 aw) making the product ideal for those larger spaces like open plan where control of ambient noise is an important consideration. Perla OP 0.95 includes a large selection of sizes and quality edge details enhancing the durability.
